text: Kalevi Valdemar Lehtovirta (20 February 1928 - 10 January 2016) was a Finnish footballer. He played as a striker. He played for TuWe Turku, Pyrkiv√§ Turku, Red Star, TPS, and the Finland national football team. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Turku. Lehtovirta died on 10 January 2016 in Turku, aged 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Finnish footballers Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Sportspeople from Turku
title: Kalevi Lehtovirta
